incidents.name: SMS and Call issues across Multiple Network In Pakistan

incident_updates.body: SMS and Call related issues across multiple networks in Pakistan is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently encountering SMS and Call related issues across multiple networks in Pakistan. This disruption is a result of the Pakistan government suspending phone services due to ongoing elections. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently encountering SMS and Call related issues across multiple networks in Pakistan. This disruption is a result of the Pakistan government suspending phone services due to ongoing elections. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently encountering SMS and Call related issues across multiple networks in Pakistan. This disruption is a result of the Pakistan government suspending phone services due to ongoing elections. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Multiple Network In Pakistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Zong Network In Pakistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Zong Network In Pakistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in one hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Super SIM Over the Air Update Delays

incident_updates.body: We have identified a fix for the issue that is preventing some Super SIMs from successfully updating to their latest settings via over-the-air (OTA) updates. The fix needs to be implemented at one of our downstream partners, who expect to begin releasing the update to impacted SIMs as soon as possible. Afterwards, we expect to see fewer OTA updates failing to complete despite multiple attempts to contact the OTA service. Please note that it may take more than one attempt for a SIM to complete the OTA update procedure as there may be occasional failures or updates may need to be downloaded in multiple parts. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified a fix for the issue that is preventing some Super SIMs from successfully updating to their latest settings via over-the-air (OTA) updates. The fix needs to be implemented at one of our downstream partners, who expect to begin releasing the update to impacted SIMs around 4pm UTC tomorrow, February 7th. Afterwards, we expect to see fewer OTA updates failing to complete despite multiple attempts to contact the OTA service. Please note that it may take more than one attempt for a SIM to complete the OTA update procedure as there may be occasional failures or updates may need to be downloaded in multiple parts. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing Super SIM Over the Air (OTA) update failures for some SIM cards. The issue is preventing Super SIMs from retrieving their latest OTA setting and optimizing connectivity for devices. We've identified a fix which will be going into testing as soon as possible. We will provide an update on Tuesday with the status of our fix.

We are experiencing Super SIM Over the Air (OTA) update failures for some SIM cards. The issue is preventing Super SIMs from retrieving their latest OTA setting and optimizing connectivity for devices. Our engineering team is actively working with the affected service provider to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Super SIM. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 08 February 2024 at 21:00 PST until 09 February 2024 at 01:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS/MMS to and from US handsets via subset of US short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 February 2024 at 23:00 PST until 09 February 2024 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following country and carriers: Bell Canada, Rogers Canada, Telus Canada.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API], Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 28 February 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 05 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
07 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 07 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
12 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 12 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
14 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 14 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
19 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 19 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
21 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 21 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
26 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 26 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
28 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 28 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
